prompt:
Give an example of how someone might use a metaphor to describe an experience they had recently.
For example, imagine you just finished cooking your favorite dish for dinner. Upon tasting it, you realize that the soup is far too salty to enjoy, and so you decide to throw it out. In this situation, you could say: “Just like my cooking experiment tonight, life has thrown me a curveball and I have to learn how to adapt my approach.”
